mapper.sql: a.MENU_ID AS menuId , a.PARENT_ID AS parentId , a.NAME AS name , a.URL AS url , a.PERMS AS perms , a.TYPE AS type , a.ICON AS icon , a.ORDER_NUM AS orderNum , a.STATUS AS status , a.CREATE_USER AS createUser , a.UPDATE_USER AS updateUser , a.CREATE_TIME AS createTime , a.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , a.DEL_FLAG AS delFlag
mapper.select:
select
from SYS_MENU a
a.DEL_FLAG = 0
AND a.PARENT_ID = #{parentId}
AND a.NAME LIKE '%#{name}%'

select
from SYS_MENU a JOIN SYS_ROLE_MENU rm on rm.MENU_ID = a.MENU_ID JOIN SYS_USER_ROLE ur on ur.C_ROLE_ID = rm.ROLE_ID where ur.ID_USER = #{userId} and a.DEL_FLAG = 0
mapper.update: update SYS_MENU a set a.DEL_FLAG = 1 where a.MENU_ID = #{id}
